#id=1
#text=I decided to go to the library this morning as I had run out of books to read .
#id=2
#text=I still love using the public library because they give me the option to borrow the book .
#id=3
#text=When I arrived at the library I was greeted at the door kindly , which I always like about the public library .
#id=4
#text=They feel more like a friend of yours than anything else .
#id=5
#text=I wanted to the fiction section as I like to read stories that are make believe .
#id=6
#text=I found a few books that I was interested in reading and decided to sit down and read a few chapters of them to see if I would like to check them out .
#id=7
#text=I grabbed myself a cup of coffee from the desk first and then proceeded to sit down and read the book .
#id=8
#text=After reading the books for about an hour I decided to borrow all 3 of them .
#id=9
#text=I went to the librarian and checked them out .
#text=I then left satisfied with my experience .
